A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is probably the worst Star Wars movie I have seen. There is so much I didn't like and below are just a few of those things (spoilers!)

- How Luke Skywalker is presented and how he dies feels so out of character and cheap. This is not the Luke we know\, this is an abomination.

- How Snoke was supposed to be this super awesome villain and then just killed off with no backstory or explanation at all.

- Finn is too much of a clumsy comedian and a waste of Boyegas talent.

- Leias "Superman" moment in space.... 

- Rey can't basicly fail\, she is so powerfull and skilled without any training that I don't care about that character anymore.

- Rose\, DJ and Holdo could have been left out with no difference to the story.

- Phasma is a disappointment yet again. Why cast Gwendoline Christie if you are just going to throw away this rather useless character?

I end here. I don't really look forward to the next movie\, the only thing the next one has going for it is that JJ Abrams is back.... yeah\, The Last Jedi is that bad.
